products.name: Daily Moringa Health Drink
products.shortDescription: Start your day with nature's multivitamin
products.ingredients: 100% Moringa (Moringa oleifera) Leaf Powder, Natural Flavor Blend
products.doctorNote: I formulated this daily health drink to make Moringa accessible to everyone. The Godavari Riverbelt's mineral-rich soil gives our Moringa leaves exceptional nutrient density. Just one teaspoon in the morning provides your daily dose of iron, calcium, and amino acids that your body craves.

howToUse.text: Mix 1 teaspoon (5g) in a glass of water or buttermilk
Consume once daily, preferably in the morning
Can be added to smoothies or juices for variety

products.name: Moringa Cocoa Smoothie Mix
products.shortDescription: Nutrition meets indulgence for the whole family
products.ingredients: Moringa Leaf Powder, Organic Cocoa Powder, Jaggery, Natural Vanilla
products.doctorNote: Getting children to eat their greens is every parent's challenge. This Cocoa-Moringa blend is my solution—rich chocolate taste that kids love, packed with the nutrition only Moringa can provide. The natural sweetness from jaggery means no refined sugar, just pure, guilt-free goodness.

howToUse.text: Blend 2 tablespoons with 200ml milk or plant-based milk
Add banana or berries for a complete smoothie
Ideal as a breakfast drink or post-workout shake

products.name: Moringa Millet Nutrition Powder
products.ingredients: Ragi (Finger Millet) Flour, Moringa Leaf Powder, Bajra (Pearl Millet), Foxtail Millet, Cardamom
products.doctorNote: This is my tribute to our grandmother's wisdom. Millets were the backbone of Indian nutrition for centuries. Combined with Moringa's complete protein profile, this powder delivers all 9 essential amino acids. Perfect for bone health, blood sugar management, and sustained energy throughout the day.

howToUse.text: Add 2 tablespoons to porridge or warm milk
Mix with wheat flour for rotis (1:4 ratio)
Best consumed in the morning or as an evening snack

products.name: Moringa Digestive Herbal Mix
products.ingredients: Moringa Seed Powder, Ajwain (Carom Seeds), Jeera (Cumin), Saunf (Fennel), Rock Salt, Dried Ginger
products.doctorNote: Digestive comfort is the foundation of overall health—this is the core principle of Ayurveda I learned during my BAMS training. This after-meal churna combines Moringa seeds with time-tested digestive herbs. Just half a teaspoon after heavy meals can make a significant difference in how you feel.

howToUse.text: Mix with warm water or consume directly
Most effective after lunch and dinner

products.name: Moringa Capsules
products.shortDescription: Pure Moringa in convenient daily capsules
products.ingredients: 100% Pure Moringa Leaf Powder (500mg per capsule), Vegetable Cellulose Capsule
products.doctorNote: Not everyone has time for powders and mixing. These capsules contain the same premium Godavari Riverbelt Moringa in a convenient, measured dose. Two capsules daily equals one teaspoon of our powder—same benefits, zero fuss. The vegetable capsule is suitable for vegetarians and vegans.

howToUse.text: Best taken in the morning with breakfast
Consistent daily use recommended for best results

products.name: Moringa Tablets
products.shortDescription: Easy-to-swallow pressed tablets for daily wellness
products.ingredients: Moringa Leaf Powder (450mg), Moringa Stem Powder (50mg), Natural Binding Agents
idealFor: Those who prefer tablets over capsules
products.doctorNote: These tablets include both Moringa leaf and stem, providing a broader spectrum of plant compounds. The stem contains additional fiber and unique antioxidants not found in leaves alone. For my elderly patients who find capsules difficult to swallow, these pressed tablets are the perfect solution.

howToUse.text: Swallow with a full glass of water
Continue for at least 3 months for optimal benefits

categories.name: Powder
categories.description: Versatile powders for drinks and cooking

founder.name: Dr. Mohini Zate
founder.title: Founder & Chief Formulator
founder.powerStatement: Every formulation I create is tested on my own family first. That's not marketing—that's my promise as a mother and a doctor.
founder.quote: Nutrition should be simple, natural, and enjoyable. When I saw the disconnect between traditional wisdom and modern convenience, I knew I had to bridge that gap. Every product in our range is something I would give to my own family.

riverbeltStory.title: The Riverbelt
riverbeltStory.description: The fertile Godavari Riverbelt soil, enriched by centuries of alluvial deposits, gives our Moringa unparalleled nutrient density.

riverbeltStory.title: Traceable Farming
riverbeltStory.description: Our HerbalGold Farmer Producer Company members practice sustainable agriculture with complete crop traceability.

riverbeltStory.title: Science-Backed Formulation
riverbeltStory.description: Dr. Mohini's lab combines ancient Ayurvedic wisdom with modern nutritional science for optimal formulations.

riverbeltStory.title: Your Home
riverbeltStory.description: From soil to soul—premium plant-based nutrition delivered to your doorstep, ready to nourish your family.
